item.title: Anchors & Shackles (Ark)
item.description: So hey guys, my name is Borat. Today I’ll be talking about something that I’ve been working on for the past, let’s say, six months or so. To give a bit of a background, I started first in a big block sort of camp and then got introduced later to Liquid. And I did some covenant R&D on Liquid for about two years, and now I’m recently exploring the Lightning space for about a year.
